title: Chapter 1105 - If You Can Last Three Strikes, Consider It My Loss
body:
Chapter 1105 - If You Can Last Three Strikes, Consider It My Loss

Earlier, everyone already knew that Su Yi was the reincarnation of the Swordmaster of Abstruse Force. Thus, they knew his combat prowess was heaven-defying.

But even more than that, they knew that the Profound Illumination Realm Su Yi wasn’t comparable to his past incarnation’s peak.

Thus, when he fought Pi Mo, some people found it hard to imagine how he could overcome a gap of two full realms.

Yet now, when they witnessed his sword’s majesty, they were astonished. It even dealt a heavy blow to their perception of reality!

The entire area boiled over.

Even the living fossils watching from the shadows gasped.

There was no doubt about it. After reincarnating, Su Xuanjun had stepped onto a new path, one even more terrifying than the one he’d walked before!

Even if his cultivation base was still far beneath that of his past life, his combat prowess surely far surpassed his past self at the same realm!

It was to the point that they couldn’t even imagine how powerful the Swordmaster of Abstruse Force would be once he stepped into the Profound Unity Realm once more.

But it was then that the distant Pi Mo threw back his head and laughed. “Master, when you were at your peak, even a casual slash could have destroyed me on the spot....
original_title: Chapter 1105 - If You Can Last Three Strikes, Consider It My Loss
